<<<<<<< HEAD
An ample declaration of the Christian doctrine. Composed in Italian by the renowned Cardinal: Card. Bellarmine. Translated into English by Richard Hadock D. of Diuinitie Bellarmino, Roberto Francesco Romolo, Saint, 1542-1621. Hadock, Richard.
274, [2] p.
English Secret Press, Printed at Roan [i.e. England : 1604?]
A translation, by Richard Hadock, of the Italian original by Roberto Bellarmino. Imprint is false; actual imprint from STC. The Douai edition of this work appeared in 1609, the Saint-Omer edition in 1624. Publication date conjectured by STC. Some print show-through. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======
